item.title: Download APache Maven on MacOS
item.description: I finally got maven installed, and the steps were generally easy, but I stepped in a few holes, I’ll record them. Download APache Maven WebsiteðŸ“¡: Apache-Maven Choose Binary zip archive and download it. Unzip the zip archive I unzip it into /Libaray on my computer. Configuration vi .bash_profile Add 2 lines into this profile export M2_HOME=/Library/apache-maven-3.8.7 // Or you can choose your
